page.title: 06Great Cornard Middle School
page.content: The Great Cornard Middle School is a big school with 510 children. It used to have 800 children. The school was built in 1972. The oldest bit of the school is the pond. The school is made of glass,steel,girders and hard board. There are 23 teachers and 18 classes and most of the children are local. The school uniform is grey and white. The second year do French and go to Derbyshire for trips. Each year goes on a different trip. The ground used to be open fields. The head teacher is Mr Budd and there are 2 deputies. The age of the children is 9-13 years old.There are one and a half acres of land shared with the Upper School.
